sentences.en: At the end of the service, scores of worshippers streamed down to the altar.

sentences.en: Napoleon's army was sacrificed on the altar of folly in the disastrous Russian campaign.
sentences.cn: 在灾难性的俄国战役中，拿破仑的军队成了这一愚蠢之举的牺牲品。

sentences.en: Pope John Paul II knelt in his white robes before the simple altar.
